name: Puzzle Challengers
description:
Puzzle Challengers is a game where you face challenges in three different types of puzzle. each challenge in campaign mode has a level of difficulty that gradually increases. In free mode you can practice, bear your own record or just play casually.

  • Campaign mode: 13 challenges. Face opponents challenges to become the top 1 in puzzle challenges.
  • Free Mode : Do your best trying to beat your own record each time.
  • Anime style design.
  • 3 types of puzzles to play:
  • Falling Shapes

  • Swap Attack

  • Slide Portraits: 5 levels in free mode
